You could code up some ASL to give certain players rights to do certain things, but they wouldn't be able to do admin stuff like disconnecting players. I suppose this would probably be a nice idea, but I think I shall leave remote administration for a later version.

Isn't the "> ...." showing you what you typed kind of important usually? It's annoying when you're speaking, yes, as I noticed last night, so I'm going to change that at least. But when you're typing real commands doesn't it help to see that your command was recieved?
